paragraphs: Welcome to my portfolio! I'm a Robotics Engineer with experience in robot control and perception using machine learning, and integrating electro mechanical systems with software.
This portfolio showcases my journey, projects, and skills. Feel free to explore and get in touch if you'd like to collaborate!

items.name: Mobile Robot Modular Gripper
description: A modular gripper attachment to the KheperaIV mobile robot.
Features the ability to rotate 360 degrees continuously, force sensing gripper, and modularity allowing attachment of additional sensors.
Designed mechanical components in CAD, created PCB's, programmed firmware in C, and manufactured multiple modules.
Skills used: KiCAD, SolidWorks, 3d printing, PCB assembly, C/C++

items.name: Interative LED Anotomical Heart
description: An illuminated anotomical human heart that lights up in different colors and patterns based on its orientation.
Modeled and printed exterior to house the micro-controller and LEDs.
Uses an IMU to send acceleration readings to an ESP32. Readings are passed through a low pass filter from which the rotation of the heart is calculated.
Skills used: Solidworks, Arduino, Blender, C/C++

responsibilities: Built framework for evaluating performance of machine learning models using robot manipulation video data
Utilized and implemented cutting edge deep learning vision models (V-JEPA, SAM) for robot monitoring
Applied video embedding models for similarity search
Explored computer vision techniques for motion planning on 6-DOF robot arm
Designed and implemented full-stack software architecture to dynamically control camera/lighting hardware systems
Took framework from prototype, to testing, to manufacturing deployment
Displayed strong debugging skills during manufacturing testing and integration
